data.title: How old is Kelly Clarkson?
data.meta_description: How old is Kelly Clarkson? Learn the birthday of Kelly Clarkson and the exact age in years, months and days, with additional information of the singer.
data.text: Kelly Brianne Clarkson was born in Texas to a conservative family. She started singing in her school choir when she was 12 years old. In her high school times she performed in some musicals. She became the winner of one of the seasons of American Idol TV show and as the winner she made a deal with RCA Records. Her debut album Thankful was released in 2003. From then on, she won lots of awards including 3 Grammy and 3 MTV Video Music Awards, she sold over 25 million albums and 44 million singles. She has released 8 studio albums and made plenty of tours in the US and beyond. She is a known TV personality and used to take part in the show The Voice as a judge, as well as have her own show. She was married to her producer and has two children but is single now. Kelly Clarkson is considered to be one of the most successful and respected singers of modern British pop music.
